approval(address,bool).details: Function to Accept/Reject or Revoke Registration .

params._accepted: - If true Ethereum Address Registration is accepted.
params._applicant: address - The Ethereum Address of the applicant.

callForHelp(string,string,string,uint256.details: Function creates the event to Call For Help.

params._amount: uint - The total amount of items needed.
params._borrow: bool - True if the items is expected to be returned in the future.
params._category: string - The category of the item.
params._ipfs: - The IPFS hash containing additional information about the event.
params._title: string - The title of the event.

callForHelpDetails(uint256).details: Function to show information about call for help event.
callForHelpDetails(uint256).return: title string - The title of the event.category string - The category of needed item.item string - The name of the item.amount uint - The amount of items needed.commited uint - The amount of items currently committed.borrow bool - True if the item is to be returned in the future.startDate uint - Start date of the event.endDate uint - End date of the event.ipfs string - The IPFS hash containing additional information about event.owner address - The owner of the event.

getMemberStatus(address).details: Function to show information about the member.

params._owner: address - The Ethereum Address of the member.

getMemberStatus(address).return: _name string - The name of the member._country string - The country where the member is located._city string - The city where the member is located._ipfs string - The IPFS hash containing additional information about event._pending bool - If true account has a pending registration._registered bool - If true account is registered._time uint - time of registration._rating uint - The rating of the account.

getNeededCount().details: Function returns number of all events.

needsOf(address).details: Function to show events of the specified address.

params._owner: address - The address to query the events of.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

pledge(uint256,uint256).details: Function to give item to the needed asstistance pool.

params._commit: - The amount of the item to commit.
params._eventId: - The ID of the Call for Help Event.

provideAssistance(string,string,string,u.details: Function creates the event to Provide Assistance.

params._amount: uint - The total amount of items to be given.
params._borrow: bool - True if the items is expected to be returned in the future.
params._category: string - The category of the item.
params._ipfs: - The IPFS hash containing additional information about the event.
params._title: string - The title of the event.

provideAssistanceDetails(uint256).details: Function to show information about give assitance event.
provideAssistanceDetails(uint256).return: title string - The title of the event.category string - The category of needed item.item string - The name of the item.amount uint - The total amount of items.committed uint - The amount of items left.borrow bool - True if the item is to be returned in the future.startDate uint - Start date of the event.endDate uint - End date of the event.ipfs string - The IPFS hash containing additional information about event.owner address - The owner of the event.

params._city: string - The city where the  requester is located.
params._country: string - The country where the requester is located.
params._ipfs: - The IPFS hash containing additional information about the  requester.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

take(uint256,uint256).details: Function to take item from the given asstistance pool.

params._eventId: - The ID of the Assistance Event.
params._take: - The amount of the item to take.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

approval(address,bool).notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the approver is the owner of contract.Requires that the applicant address does not have a pending registration.

callForHelp(string,string,string,uint256.notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the sender is registered.Requires that the event time is in the future.Requires that the sender rating is greater than or equal to 20.Requires that the amount is greater than 0.

pledge(uint256,uint256).notice: Requires that the event exist.Requires that the commit is greater than 0.Requires that the amount of items to give is <= total needed items in the pool.Requires that the amount of items to give is <= current needed items in the pool.Requires that the giver is not the creator of the event.Requires that the events hasn't ended yet.

provideAssistance(string,string,string,u.notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the sender is registered.Requires that the event time is in the future.Requires that the amount is greater than 0.

register(string,string,string,string).notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the applicant address is not yet registered & does not have a pending registration.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

take(uint256,uint256).notice: Requires that the event exist.Requires that the sender rating is greater than or equal to 10.Requires that the amount to take is greater than 0.Requires that the amount to take is greater than minimum.Requires that the amount of items to take is <= current available items in the pool.Requires that the taker is not the creator of the event.Requires that the events hasn't ended yet.
